Title: Shootout at Lokhandwala
Writer: Apoorva Lakhia, Suresh Nair, Raj Vasant (Dialogue)
Actors: Amitabh Bachchan, Sanjay Dutt, Sunil Shetty, Arbaaz Khan
Plot: An account of the gangster Mahindra Dolas and his gang, which terrorized Mumbai City, and a massive war between Mumbai Police and gangs during 16 November 1991.
